name: Taxi Menagerie
description:
Ay Buddy, I wont lie to you.... Yous about to make a fat wod o'chedda driving these farm animals around New York. 

Escort Farm Animals to their desired location.

If the yellow arrow is up, you are in service!

Avoid hitting cars, or else you'll have to buy them off with your hard earn cash.

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move the Taxi
  • SPACE Bar - Accelerate

Make enough cash to fly the UFO.

A submission into GEOPIPE GAME JAM 2023

Taxi Menagerie by BearFoot Studio

---------Voice Talent----------------

Saul Barnett - Taxi Driver Vocals

Matt Lowman - Farm Animals

Special thank to Geopipe for hosting this JAM!

--------------------ASSETS------------------------------------

New York Landscapes and buildings by GeoPipe

Old Barn Model by carlosjorgereis

Farm Animals Assets by Lylek Games

Low Poly Cars (80 Cars) by Mighty Handful

SciFi Shaders by SomeoneWhoCares

Flooded Grounds (UFO) by Sandro T

----------Music---------

Upbeat Funky Retro by QubeSounds

Fashion Upbeat Electronica by ComaStudio

Rock It by Coma-Media
